name: SilQ Bangkok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel at a convenient location - just 5-min walk from Asok BTS and close to two 7-11 outlets.
reviews.title: Great location at great price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room is very clean. There was a nice armchair and the room was large enough for 2 persons to walk around comfortably. Also, the room looked exactly as the hotel pictures.
reviews.title: Great place in busy Bangkok
Excellent as usual
reviews.text: The hotel staff were very polite and helpful. They always smiled and greeted guests when they entered the hotel. The staff also assisted in flagging taxis for us, and showed us how to get to the main tourist attractions in Bangkok.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff was very helpful and accommodating. The room was very clean. Hotel is close by to shopping and restaurants. Easy to commute. It was a great stay!
reviews.title: Nice place and very comfortable bed for a thai hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was my 3rd time back in the past 3 years. I am glad the hotel remain as well-maintained as when it was brand new. The service standard is excellent as usual - friendly and helpful. When I feedbacked to the staff on the slow draining of water in the bathroom and that the bathroom door did not close easily, they were fixed within the day while we were out and about. I am also glad that I recognise the service staff who have been there since the hotel opened - maybe a sign that they enjoy working here. Also, the hotel has added on additional services such as room service (which was not available when it first opened), which makes it even better.
reviews.title: Much better than I expected!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and me spent a whole week in SilQ during our stay in Bangkok, in a Superior room.
reviews.title: Awesome service and value vs. price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were extremely satisfied during our stay. The service was excellent, friendly and well-informed. The room was comfortable and well equipped (a great value for the hotel price), and with free internet access. And the hotel is less than 5min walking distance from both SkyTrain and Metro stations.
reviews.title: Great hotel - everything in its correct place

reviews.text: Due to the earthquake in Japan, where my wife an me live, we had to change the length of our stay several times (first make it longer, then short it down). Not only the staff was friendly and cooperative, but they also gave us the best rates and charged us no late cancellation fees.
reviews.title: An hidden pearl

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only down side is the breakfast, with very little choices (I guess this is not a problem for a weekend stay, but it became a little tiring after one week).
reviews.title: Not worth the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I had spent the previous week in the Mercure Bangkok Park Avenue in business trip, and I found SilQ had better staff, better rooms and cheaper price. I highly recommend SilQ!
reviews.title: Hated Bangkok - loved SilQ Hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on our recent trip throug SE Asia for just one night, when we arrived we got upgraded to Superior room which was a nice start. They treated us a some free refreshments whilst we waited for our room to be readied, as it was rather early in the morning still. Porter took care of our bags in the meantime.
reviews.title: Great hotel, excellent service, bargain!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was very spacious, modern and clean and one of the nicest we've ever stayed in. Bed was absolutely massive and plush! Staff was very helpfull and extremely friendly, always aiming to help and sorted us out with whatever we needed.
reviews.title: The best of service. The friendliest of staff.

reviews.text: Location is a bit too far away from the city centre, but then this is why the price is pretty reasonable for Bangkok.They can sort you out with a taxi to get you wherever you want to go to anyway, saving you the hassle of having to deal with that yourself.
reviews.title: You Can't Miss with SilQ

reviews.text: Would definetely recommend this hotel if you want to spend a few days in Bangkok and are not just on a quick stopover
reviews.title: Good location, small rooms.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Out stay in Bangkok was made even more pleasurable by the super helpful staff of the hotel. The room was large, very well appointed and comfortable with outside views. The location is just great with both skyrail and underground close by and an attentive taxi service. The health clinic just around the corner is a plus with their massage services. Shopping needs and restaurants are just across the road. When I twisted my ankle while out walking, staff went out of their way to help me with ice and ointment with offers of medical attention if needed. We ate breakfast in the hotel every morning and the breakfast staff are sweet and fabulous. We really enjoyed the fruit and table layout with the chef making perfect omlettes. No hesitation in staying at SilQ again.
reviews.title: Boutique and Brilliant

reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights in March on business. I would rate it at 5 star for the qualiity of staff, service and the general appearance and with small hotels like these you get a more personal touch from all the staff.
reviews.title: Top Quality hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent location and near to many fiine restaurants. I wiill return her on busiinedss again and would happily stay here again.
reviews.title: We would have given this place five stars

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nothing to do with the hotel but I was disapointed in Bangkok. One piece of advise would be to use the sky train as much as possible rather than taxis as the roads are so busy.
reviews.title: Nice little hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We lived in Hotel SilQ six weeks winter 2011. The hotel was clean, little and homey. Room was beautifully decorated and located quite place.
reviews.title: Great Value Modern hotel

reviews.text: It was great that skytrain and underground were near. And we are very pleased with hotel; Staff was kind and helpful. The breakfast was multifaceted and good.
reviews.title: Smart choice for staying in Bangkok

description: SilQ is 40 room boutique hotel located in the heart of shopping and the entertainment district of Sukhumvit on Soi 19, SilQ Bangkok provides elegant accommodation in the city center. The hotel is within walking distance 150 meters to Asoke BTS station and from 175 meter to Sukhumvit MRT, and a stone's throw away from Shopping center, Terminal 21, Robinson and the Queen Sirikit National Convention Center. The Suvarnabhumi Airport is 20 km away. All guest rooms are elegantly decorated with soothing colors. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV and personal safe. The on-site restaurant features a great selection of Thai in cool setting and the Lobby Lounge offers an inviting ambiance for sipping cocktails at the end of the day.
